about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the prison life of the most dangerous criminal in modern Russia.Go through the prison path from the beginning and determine the fate of the famous defendant. What will you become? Offended, authority or maybe the president of the Russian Federation? Everything depends on you!

Features:



  • Non-linear storyline with many fateful decisions.
  • Many unexpected endings
  • Possibility to show your education and erudition in solving prison riddles
  • Many colorful and detailed characters
  • The ability to customize the look by changing clothes and applying tattoos
  • Build your muscles to stand up for yourself and become a Boss Of The Gym ♂
  • Improve your intellect by playing backgammon and cards with Armenians
  • Atmospheric musical accompaniment
  • Buy goodies from the huckster and everything will be good
  • Based on true events!
  • And be careful with soap!
